Package server.request

Class Request

java.lang.Object
server.request.Request
public class Request extends Object
Represents an HTTP request to the server, to which the server responds to An HTTP requests consists of a status line, containing the protocol, request method, and url, the requests headers, and the requests body.
Version:
1.0 - May 21st 2023
Author:
Harry Xu

    Request.StatusLine
